text: Sandy Creek is a stream in Audrain, Montgomery and Pike counties in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is a tributary of the Cuivre River. Sandy Creek was named for the sandy character of its course. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Audrain County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Montgomery County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Pike County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Sandy Creek (Cuivre River tributary)
